title: 8 new job openings for senior-level architects and designers in Los Angeles
author: Nathaniel Bahadursingh
excerpt: The latest edition of our curated jobs roundup from the Archinect Job board features eight employers in the Los Angeles area offering senior-level architecture, design, and project management jobs. To explore specific job titles from the architectural...
text: The latest edition of our curated jobs roundup from the Archinect Job board features eight employers in the Los Angeles area offering senior-level architecture, design, and project management jobs. To explore specific job titles from the architectural profession, consult Archinect's Guide to Job Titles series. Also, follow our Archinect Tips series to improve your portfolio, resume, and interviewing skills, to increase your overall chances of getting that next job. Rapt Studio seeks a Practice Director (Project Director / Senior Creative Project Manager/Producer)"At Rapt, Studio Leads hold a project and resource management position. They’re responsible for overseeing the project lifecycle—guiding the studio's delivery process, crafting new business proposals, developing project scopes, onboarding new initiatives, mentoring Project Leads, and driving project operations. Ultimately they’re responsible for ensuring teams are thoughtfully constructed to deliver projects on time, within budget, and exceeding client expectations." RIOS seeks a Senior Landscape Project Director"We are seeking a Landscape Project Director to coordinate and manage strategies on multiple projects. Interested applicants must be a deeply knowledgeable project delivery lead who constantly works to improve the quality of project deliverables. A positive team player that can work collaboratively and independently." ROW DTLA by RIOS.Bunch Design seeks a Senior Project Architect (7-10 years experience)Qualifications include seven to ten years of experience, fluency in CAD, SketchUp, V-Ray, and Adobe Creative Suite, and extensive experience in custom design residential projects. Desired applicants should also be motivated, independent, flexible, and cooperative problem solvers, with a strong work ethic and excellent communication skills. Echo Park ADU by Bunch Design. Photo: Yoshihiro MakinoWolcott Architecture Interiors seeks a Senior Interior Designer"We are currently seeking experienced residential Senior Interior Designers who have extensive experience in all areas of residential design from programming to construction administration. The Senior Interior Designer may work on several concurrent projects, ranging from medium-large scale residential and commercial interior architecture scope to tenant improvements. The Senior Designer works independently on various projects as assigned by a Project Manager.  They may oversee the entire design process or assist as a technical expert on a specialized design." The firm is also hiring for an Architectural Designer in Los Angeles. Mark Haddawy Inc. seeks a Senior Architectural Designer"Mark Haddawy Inc., a design studio specializing in architectural restoration and interiors, is seeking a Senior Designer. This role is responsible for producing drawings and renderings quickly and with keen attention to detail, while overseeing the work of Junior Designers." Qualifications include proficiency with Rhino, AutoCAD, and/or SketchUp Pro, as well as an appreciation and understanding of mid-century architecture and design. Ellwood Moore House by Mark Haddawy Inc.Studio One Eleven seeks a Senior Designer"The Senior Designer is required to understand good urban design principles for 21st century cities, as well as working knowledge of architectural design, especially mixed-use and housing typologies. Ability to quickly communicate concepts through drawings/sketches and experience with a diversity of design project types is preferred, including visioning, site capacity studies, conceptual public space design and planning and creating design guidelines, research documents and reports. Strong verbal and visual communication skills, ability to write clearly and concisely, as well as experience with executing outreach efforts is preferred." Kadre Architects seeks a Senior Technical Architect"We are seeking a detail-oriented and technically expert, yet design-focused senior architect to join our team.  The successful candidate will assist project teams to develop, document & deliver beautifully resolved, meticulous and technically robust solutions to detailing & design problems. They will have significant experience in the delivery of complex projects across residential, civic, and commercial sectors.  The ideal candidate will draw on their significant experience to ensure a project’s material resolution is robust & constructible whilst reinforcing the established design direction." The Sierras Housing by Kadre Architects.Taylor Design seeks a Senior Project Manager in Healthcare"The Senior Project Manager is responsible for the successful completion of one or more projects, managing all phases of the project from conceptual design through construction document delivery. In addition, the Senior Project Manager oversees and supervises the work of project team members within project team(s). Responsibilities for mentoring, coaching, and goal setting with team members." The firm is also hiring for a Senior Project Manager in Healthcare in Sacramento and Senior Project Managers in Healthcare in Tustin, California. If you don't already, follow Archinect on Facebook, X, Instagram, Pinterest, Linkedin, and Threads, as well as on our dedicated Archinect Jobs Facebook, X, Instagram, and Threads feeds.
html:
The latest edition of our curated jobs roundup from the Archinect Job board features eight employers in the Los Angeles area offering senior-level architecture, design, and project management jobs.

To explore specific job titles from the architectural profession, consult Archinect's Guide to Job Titles series. Also, follow our Archinect Tips series to improve your portfolio, resume, and interviewing skills, to increase your overall chances of getting that next job.

Rapt Studio seeks a Practice Director (Project Director / Senior Creative Project Manager/Producer)
"At Rapt, Studio Leads hold a project and resource management position. They’re responsible for overseeing the project lifecycle—guiding the studio's delivery process, crafting new business proposals, developing project scopes, onboarding new initiatives, mentoring Project Leads, and driving project operations. Ultimately they’re responsible for ensuring teams are thoughtfully constructed to deliver projects on time, within budget, and exceeding client expectations."

RIOS seeks a Senior Landscape Project Director
"We are seeking a Landscape Project Director to coordinate and manage strategies on multiple projects. Interested applicants must be a deeply knowledgeable project delivery lead who constantly works to improve the quality of project deliverables. A positive team player that can work collaboratively and independently."

Bunch Design seeks a Senior Project Architect (7-10 years experience)
Qualifications include seven to ten years of experience, fluency in CAD, SketchUp, V-Ray, and Adobe Creative Suite, and extensive experience in custom design residential projects. Desired applicants should also be motivated, independent, flexible, and cooperative problem solvers, with a strong work ethic and excellent communication skills.

Wolcott Architecture Interiors seeks a Senior Interior Designer
"We are currently seeking experienced residential Senior Interior Designers who have extensive experience in all areas of residential design from programming to construction administration. The Senior Interior Designer may work on several concurrent projects, ranging from medium-large scale residential and commercial interior architecture scope to tenant improvements. The Senior Designer works independently on various projects as assigned by a Project Manager.  They may oversee the entire design process or assist as a technical expert on a specialized design."

The firm is also hiring for an Architectural Designer in Los Angeles.

Mark Haddawy Inc. seeks a Senior Architectural Designer
"Mark Haddawy Inc., a design studio specializing in architectural restoration and interiors, is seeking a Senior Designer. This role is responsible for producing drawings and renderings quickly and with keen attention to detail, while overseeing the work of Junior Designers." Qualifications include proficiency with Rhino, AutoCAD, and/or SketchUp Pro, as well as an appreciation and understanding of mid-century architecture and design.

Studio One Eleven seeks a Senior Designer
"The Senior Designer is required to understand good urban design principles for 21st century cities, as well as working knowledge of architectural design, especially mixed-use and housing typologies. Ability to quickly communicate concepts through drawings/sketches and experience with a diversity of design project types is preferred, including visioning, site capacity studies, conceptual public space design and planning and creating design guidelines, research documents and reports. Strong verbal and visual communication skills, ability to write clearly and concisely, as well as experience with executing outreach efforts is preferred."

Kadre Architects seeks a Senior Technical Architect
"We are seeking a detail-oriented and technically expert, yet design-focused senior architect to join our team.  The successful candidate will assist project teams to develop, document & deliver beautifully resolved, meticulous and technically robust solutions to detailing & design problems. They will have significant experience in the delivery of complex projects across residential, civic, and commercial sectors.  The ideal candidate will draw on their significant experience to ensure a project’s material resolution is robust & constructible whilst reinforcing the established design direction."

Taylor Design seeks a Senior Project Manager in Healthcare
"The Senior Project Manager is responsible for the successful completion of one or more projects, managing all phases of the project from conceptual design through construction document delivery. In addition, the Senior Project Manager oversees and supervises the work of project team members within project team(s). Responsibilities for mentoring, coaching, and goal setting with team members."

The firm is also hiring for a Senior Project Manager in Healthcare in Sacramento and Senior Project Managers in Healthcare in Tustin, California.

If you don't already, follow Archinect on Facebook, X, Instagram, Pinterest, Linkedin, and Threads, as well as on our dedicated Archinect Jobs Facebook, X, Instagram, and Threads feeds.
